name: Class Only
description: You may only use classes (no job stone)

name: No bling bling
description: Unequip all right side

name: Go in as a noob
description: Activate minimum ilevel

name: More is the enemy of good
description: You may only use a maximum of 3 actions

name: Full immersion
description: disable HUD

name: What is a keyboard?
description: You may only use the mouse for the full instance. If your mouse has special button, you cannot use them.

name: Fourth Person View
description: Everybody goes on Discord, starts streaming and you can only look at the stream of someone else

name: Agro management
description: Tank cannot use stance

name: Tank Master Race
description: you may enter only as tanks

name: Heal Master Race
description: you may enter only as healers

name: DPS Master Race
description: you may enter only as dps

name: Putain de RP
description: No running, play it role play, cut scene on

name: What is a mouse?
description: You may only use the keyboard for the full instance

name: Drunk
description: In the keybinding, invert forward/backward and left/right. And invert mouse/pad axis as well (char option -> General)

name: FPS
description: Use FPS view (aka max zoom, be sure the option is activated in char option -> General)

name: Fear freeze
description: If you're in combat, you're not allowed to move

name: Je suis un ing√©nieur informaticien
description: Before entering the instance, prepare a macro, you may only use this very macro during the whole instance.

name: Maping Eorzea
description: Open the map. Make it opaque and make it cover almost the entire screen. You're only allowed to look at the map, not the normal view

name: Left handed
description: Invert your peripheral's hand (ie. it right-handed, left-mouse, right-keyboard

name: Glamour is the real endgame
description: You may only equip level 1 glamour equipment

name: Gcd only
description: You may only use actions on global cooldown

name: Ogcd only
description: You may only use actions off global cooldown
